title: terms_118.txt
terms:
Here are the terms and conditions of sale extracted from the text:

*   “Our templates are for general information only. You should not rely on them, and Juro is not liable for any reliance on them. The templates might contain errors, including unlawful provisions and might create risks and liabilities if used.”
*   “By accessing any template, you accept these terms and agree that any use is at your own risk.”
*   “The relationship between businesses and their customers is the bedrock of commerce, and this relationship is often governed by terms and conditions of sale.”
*   “These terms dictate the conditions under which a product or service is sold and set the groundwork for a successful business relationship.”
*   “The agreement between businesses and their customers is the bedrock of commerce, and this relationship is often governed by terms and conditions of sale.”
*   “These terms define the rights, responsibilities, and obligations of both parties. For instance, the T&Cs will specify the product or service details, the agreed price, and the conditions under which a return or refund might be possible.”
*   “These terms ensure that both parties understand their obligations and rights.”
*   “If either side fails to uphold their end of the agreement, the other can seek remedies, which might include legal action.”
*   “The template is for general information only. You should not rely on them, and Juro is not liable for any reliance on them. The templates might contain errors, including unlawful provisions and might create risks and liabilities if used.”
*   “By accessing any template, you accept these terms and agree that any use is at your own risk.”
*   “We collect data from people browsing our website, customers of Juro, and people who view / sign contracts through Juro, when”
*   “To keep Juro running, we use cookies and third-party service providers.”
*   “We use only necessary cookies to run and improve the service.”
*   “Our third-party service providers use cookies too (which they control).”
*   “You can turn off cookies to recognize you in-app messaging and you can't resolve issues as easily.”
*   “If you have any concerns about your privacy at Juro, please email us at support@juro.com.”
*   “When and how we collect data – we collect data from people browsing our website, customers of Juro, and people who view / sign contracts through Juro, when”
*   “We use to keep Juro running, and improve the service.”

I have focused on the key clauses and statements related to legal and terms of service.
